## SessionDescriptionHandler.waitForIceGatheringComplete() method

Wait for ICE gathering to complete.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected waitForIceGatheringComplete(restart?: boolean, timeout?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  restart | <code>boolean</code> | If true, waits if current state is "complete" (waits for transition to "complete"). |
|  timeout | <code>number</code> | Milliseconds after which waiting times out. No timeout if 0. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
